name: CLIFFHANGER (itch) (MissdelaCuisse, Benjiiiee, phalan, Kolos94)
description:
Ciffhanger is a physics based game, where a group of climbers linked together try to reach their camp. You'll need to hold on yourself.  Each climber will have an associated key you'll need to press to keep a him/her from falling down. Try to keep your momentum while reaching your camp.  

Try to complete the 5 levels (and tell us if you were able to find the hidden bear).
